summary: When the members of a caravan of pioneers find a daisy growing in the middle of the desert they decide to stop there and to build their town on this very spot. Houses soon spring up like ... See full summary »
cast: Marcel Bozzuffi|Pierre Trabaud|Jacques Balutin|Jacques Jouanneau|Pierre Tornade|Jean Berger|Roger Carel|Jacques Fabbri|Jacques Legras|Claude Dasset|Jacques Bodoin|Georges Atlas|André Le Gall|Jacques Hilling|Rosy Varte|Denise Bosc|Helge Kjærulff-Schmidt|Gérard Rinaldi|Nicole Croisille|Rich Little|Pat Woods
title: Lucky Luke el intrépido
